Smile is an app to help you stay positive. Smile is in no way affiliated to any websites. The contents in this app is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice or treatment. Always seek the advice of a qualified counsellor for better results. Activities mentioned in this should be done in your own risk.
Questions, feedback, or suggestions? Feel free to contact us.

My Stuffs \n \n Notes, Diaries and more...

There is no royal road to anything, one thing at a time, all things in succession. That which grows fast, withers as rapidly. That which grows slowly, endures
Use this when your emotions start to control you. Know more about what\'s happening in you and get help to overcome it.
Your mind needs some exercises to stay healthy. This section tells you different techniques for a happy mind.
Read the best articles from the internet every day that can help you to live a better life. \n(Copyright of all the images and contents belongs to the respective site or author)
Get motivated, inspired and informed from quotes. Go to Settings to turn on quotes notification to get daily quote notification on your device.
Save your notes, write daily diary and get reports on your month in this section. You can password protect this section. Go to settings - Privacy to make your data private.

"Track your days and get reports on how it's going. For this feature, you must rate your days. You can rate each day by going to "Today" section by clicking the 't' icon on the home screen. You can also set a reminder to get a notification asking you to rate your day, daily at a particular time. (If you are using android version 4.4 or above, you can update your rating from the notification itself, without entering the app). Go to Settings - Daily mood query.

How to use My Reports?

Use 'My Reports' to get details on how your days are going. You need at least 7 day's rating (From the same month) to get a report. After viewing your reports, click the 'Make it better' button to see the recommended articles for you. The articles you see will be based on your reports and will be different each time."
A collection of handpicked quotes for you
